Pappagallo's Pizza Reviews | Satellite Beach, Florida | One Bite Download Home Top Restaurants Pappagallo's Pizza Pappagallo's Pizza 1769 Jimmy Buffett Memorial Highway, Satellite Beach, Florida Dave 0.0 Community 7.5 Rated 7.5 based on 11 reviews Facebook Twitter Copy Link More 1 like jesse.vickers 3/27/24 3:44 PM About Pappagallo's Pizza Powered by 3,109 Yelp Reviews jesse.vickers 3/27/24, 3:44 p.m. 9.0 This place has a great story open for 34 years and the recipes are from the owners Nona’s personal old Italy collection! Everything is made fresh in house! The staff were incredible friendly and well trained on the history of the business! Food was incredible but based off the staff this place is for sure a 10!! 1 like thedefigreek 8/11/23, 10:02 p.m. 7.2 Great drunk pizza 0 likes beach.pizziola 7/3/21, 12:00 a.m. 7.8 Yeasty dough has slight chew, sauce is sweet, cheese blend has good tug. Meatball, onion & sweet peppers.
Pizziola’s are hand tossing. Damn good for a gasser 0 likes clayton.barone 6/12/21, 5:52 p.m. 5.9 0 likes jeff.minnick 4/7/21, 6:15 p.m. 7.8 3 Cheese White had great flavor...extra crispy also. 0 likes r2rich 3/7/21, 9:41 p.m. 7.8 Pappagallo’s is good solid pizza.  Sauce is solid, good cheese, just a bit on the soft or doughy side for me.  We also had a salad - very good, and a calzone  - very fresh, garlic knots - ehhh.  Really enjoy the location, a parking lot between you and the ocean.  You can sit out back, or enjoy the tables or bar inside.  El Prez says you drive to places if it’s an 8, Pappagallo’s is well worth a drive if you put it all together.  That’s the review. 0 likes mason.s2 8/5/20, 11:22 p.m. 6.8 0 likes quinton.sifford 8/5/20, 11:08 p.m. 6.2 0 likes nauerlater 7/9/19, 10:02 p.m. 7.1 Super doughy, a little bit of grease. Good tang on the sauce and good cheese. Just a little too doughy for me to give it a higher score. 0 likes hayden.pellegrino 3/13/19, 12:33 a.m. 8.4 0 likes chelsea.beard 1/26/19, 1:10 a.m. 8.9 Best pizza I’ve had in awhile!! Great Italian family restaurant on the beach! 0 likes (321) 773-7272 1769 Jimmy Buffett Memorial Highway Satellite Beach, Florida 32937 Something not look right? Pappa Gallo | Authentic Peruvian Cuisine in Rockville Centre top of page Home About Menu Reservations Order Now Event Inquiry Catering More Use tab to navigate through the menu items. Home About Menu Reservations Order Now Event Inquiry Catering More Use tab to navigate through the menu items. Welcome to Promo Now Open for Brunch & Dinner! Be among the first to experience the magic of Peru right here on Long Island! Pappa Gallo invites the Long Island com munity and all lovers of Peruvian cuisine and culture to join us for an unforgettable dining experience, complete with live music, Tuesday through Sunday. ​ Join us for Brunch every Saturday & Sunday 12pm - 4pm or Dinner Tuesday - Sunday starting at 5pm ​ Follow us on Instagram to stay updated on our live performances throughout the week! RESERVE NOW About Us About We started our business in 2023 with one goal in mind: providing an elevated dining experience that captures the essence of Peruvian cuisine to Long Island, NY. Pappa Gallo is more than just a restaurant; it's an immersive journey into the heart of modern Peru. Every detail has been carefully crafted to create an inviting and captivating atmosphere that complements the dining experience. Make a reservation today and see why Pappa Gallo is simply unforgettable. Reservations 18% GRATUITY ON CHECKS $75+ 20% GRATUITY FOR PARTIES OF 6+ SEATING TIME LIMIT OF 120 MINUTES Menu Pappa Gallo's menu is a culinary tour de force, curated by the renowned Executive Chef Emmanuel Piqueras. From the refreshing and tangy ceviches to the savory and tender Lomo Saltado, Chef Piqueras's culinary expertise and heritage shines through, delivering an authentic and unforgettable dining experience that showcases the very best of Peruvian cuisine. Explore the Menu Order Now Catering Great decor and ambiance in the restaurant, beautiful art work all around and just a really cool place to be. We loved the live music and of course the food was great... I can’t wait to come back with more friends and family. Jonathan Calderon Amazing food, ambience was very vibrant, and drinks were superb. Highly recommend!!! Khiry Marshall Absolutely stunning restaurant. The food has beautiful presentation and even better taste. Staff is super friendly and attentive and the drinks are delicious! Gotta go back and try them all! Damian Sciaraffia Every dish was well executed, staff is amazing, drinks are on point. Bring your partner here for date night, you won’t be disappointed. Oh and they have a live band, this place is definitely a vibe. Italian Restaurant in Grand Cayman - Ristorante Pappagallo Home About About Us History About the Ristorante Meet our Chef Menu Dinner Menu Dessert Menu Wine List Sunday Brunch Private Dining/ Events Contact Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor. Aenean massa... +(406) 555-0120 Andé Restaurant 767 5th Avenue, Paris 10021, France Brochetterestaurant@gmail.com Opening Hours: Mon - Fri: 9:00am - 10:00pm 2024-10-21-06-32-25-Final-VideoNew Unmute a place off the beaten path and far from ordinary Step into the unique charm and tranquility of Ristorante Pappagallo Ristorante Pappagallo is situated on a 14-acre bird sanctuary overlooking a natural salt water lagoon-home to herons, egrets, ducks and numerous other local and migratory birds. The area surrounding Pappagallo is so rich in natural wildlife that most of the book "Birds of the Cayman Islands" (1985 Patricia Bradley and Yves Jacques Ray Millet) was researched and photographed here. read more about us Once you try it, you will love it. THE MENU Ristorante Pappagallo is perfect for any occasion from a business dinner to a more intimate affair. Here couples often indulge in a romantic tete-a-tete while families can come together in celebration. Pappagallo is also an ideal venue for corporate functions and special events which can be designed to suit any occasion. LiverPool Nic+Zoe Tribal Gift Certificate Contact Us Select Page Pappagallo Classiques, “The Girlfriend Boutique,” is an upscale women’s one  stop shop, dressing the daughter, mother and grandmother. Providing delivery in Satellite Beach and surrounding areas At Pappagallos we pride ourselves on being a total ocean-view beach-side experience and not just a restaurant. Give us a call at 321-773-7272 or visit our website at pappagallos.com Find the Best Pizza in Satellite Beach Florida | Great views Come on you know you want to Find the Best Pizza in Satellite Beach Florida. Look no further. We are right off A1A, our exact address is 1769 florida a1a satellite beach fl 32937. Are you looking for a career and not just a job? If the answer is YES, Find the Best Pizza in Satellite Beach Florida then the award-winning Pappagallo’s restaurant in Satellite Beach, FL might just be the right opportunity for you.Pappagallo’s caters to the most modern families that wants quality, made to order dining experience and not just a quick, stamped out, drive-thru meal. We are very committed to over delivering in customer service and serving incredibly tasting food. We also help grow relationships by donating and giving back to local schools and area youth sports teams. Find the Best Pizza in Satellite Beach Florida and meet our team members who are expected to deliver a standard excellence, which is why the pay that we offer is excellent as well. As for team members we are seeking a diligent, coach-able and highly motivated individual who has the passion and experience, and pride to create memorable meals, especially pizza.. If you want to join our elite team of creative & motivated culinary professionals, apply today. If you can’t find a way to get to work on time every time don’t apply. We like professionalism, passion and determination. A fun fact is Since opening our doors in 1990, we have been featured in Florida Today, Hometown News, Channel 9 and Channel 6 News. Our vision To create a memorable dine in or take out dining experience for the modern family who choose to rise above the typical fast food experience is extraordinary. Our atmosphere will create a modern homemade dining experience, we hold our crew members to a quality standard that is different from our competitors. When you experience our service you will immediately know what we’re all about. Our service has been designed with the discerning family in mind. Our service features an attention to detail, a wide range of customizable meal options, and friendly/reliable service. Our Pappagallo’s was founded by (Founder / Chief Operating Officer) Dave Rich. Dave Rich is a successful entrepreneur who has owned businesses since 1990. You will be so happy to find some really good service. Our work can most definitely make sure you have a good time here. At Pappagallo’s we believe that one of the biggest problems in every city is the breakdown of the family and the effect it has on children. To show our support and to help make a difference, we proudly donate to local schools, churches and other organizations that help support and mentor children. If you feel like you’re ready to apply and would fit in to our pizza family and be a positive additive, Please email us at: pappagallos@cfl.rr.com Job options and Types: Full-time, Part-time Salary: $8.56 to $15.00 /hour Stop by today you wont regret it and leave with a pizza changed mind. Give us a call today at 321-773-7272 or visit our website at pappagallos.com Facebook Youtube Instagram © 2025 Pappagallo’s Pizza. Popular restaurant in Satellite Beach gets new lease, and new opportunity News Space Sports Opinions Restaurants Advertise Obituaries eNewspaper Legals DINING Beachside restaurant owners turn initial fear about displacement into new opportunity Amber Olesen Florida Today AI-assisted summary Facing the sale of their building, the owners of Morning Glory Eatery and Pappagallo's Pizza secured a two-year lease extension, potentially longer. The family purchased a former Beef O’ Brady’s and plan to open a new restaurant, Tailgaters, in Summer 2025. The original restaurants, Pappagallo's Pizza and Morning Glory Eatery, remain open at their current location. When the owners of Pappagallo’s Pizza and Morning Glory Eatery found out the beachside building housing their restaurants was being sold, their initial reaction: panic. Especially since Dave Rich, along with his wife, Tricia, and son, Nik, had secured a third leased space in the same Satellite Beach plaza for a new gelato shop . Rich tried to purchase the building, on the eastside of State Road A1A, but he said the previous owner opted for a quick all-cash sale. With more than 60 employees and a deep-rooted history in the beachside community, Rich and his family scrambled to find another location to keep Pappagallos alive. It just so happened that a property not too far away, located at 724 S. Patrick Drive, had come on the market as a once-popular sports bar and restaurant, part of a national chain, was closing after 18 years in business. That was the former Beef O'Brady's building, which Rich quickly bought with plans to relocate Pappagallo's. Then things changed again allowing Pappagallo's and Rich's other two establishments to stay where they are, and opening the door to a fourth business for the Rich family. Looking for a free mini puzzle? Play the USA TODAY Quick Cross now. Rich was able to secure a two-year agreement to stay at the original location, with the option of perhaps additional time. Rich said they will stay in the plaza for as long as they can or until it is demolished and potentially replaced with condominiums. Brevard gets a Trader Joe's: Will it rival ALDI's popularity? Top trivia nights: Where to play and win in Brevard County Last chance: Longtime Cocoa favorite restaurant to shut down after 45 years Best bar in Brevard? Believe the hype. This downtown Melbourne staple deserves the honor. And now, they have a new concept joining the family portfolio of beachside enterprises: Tailgaters Restaurant, which will open at the former Beef O'Brady's property this summer. “There’s a silver lining to it all. The amount of community support we have received is overwhelming," Rich said. "We have second generation kids that work here. Their parents worked here. We’ve been here for so long.” What’s planned for the former Beef O'Brady's site? That building is currently under renovation. Rich plans to demolish the kitchen and expand, invest in all new equipment and furnishings, keeping only the original exhaust. “It will be totally different. Guests won’t recognize it, for sure. Everything is going to be new and redone,” he said. And when it reopens, it will be Tailgaters, offering breakfast and lunch for a few months while they find their footing. Then it will expand into dinner hours. Opening is planned for this summer. Wait, what about the gelato? Currently in their soft opening phase, Beaches and Cream is open at 1773 State Road A1A, from 3 p.m. to 9:30 p.m., next door to Pappagallo's. A true family affair, like all their restaurants, Rich's wife and son assist him in handmaking the gelato and sorbets. Expanding beyond traditional vanilla and chocolate, Nik, renowned for his bartending expertise, crafted a "signature margarita flavor" featuring hints of mango, lime, and basil. And if Beaches and Cream happens to be closed, stop into Pappagallo's and ask if they have any gelato to grab and go. Morning Glory Eatery and Pappagallo’s Pizza Pappagallo's Pizza has been in Satellite Beach at 1769 State Road A1A, since 1990. Rich and family took over ownership in 2008. They make their own bread and pizza dough, offer indoor and outdoor seating, with views of the ocean and have a killer catch phrase: Legalize Marinara. The Riches have owned Morning Glory Eatery in the same complex, which previously housed Sun on the Beach, since 2019, following a complete remodel. Whether guests choose the crab benedict or the son of a biscuit — there's a bright dining room or a sweet outdoor deck with a view and a breeze waiting. Amber Olesen is FLORIDA TODAY's food and dining reporter.
